articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 吴说获悉，Trusta Labs 分析指出存在 96,755 个领取 ARB 的女巫地址，总获利 ARB 达到 164,153,951 个。略少于早先 X-explore 的研究（148,595 个女巫地址与 2.53 亿 ARB 代币）。其中多个团伙归集地址均大于200个，单个团伙获利 ARB 超出二十万枚。阅读全文：https://medium.com/@trustalabs.ai/arbitrum%E7%A9%BA%E6%8A%95-%E8%BF%98%E8%83%BD%E5%81%9A%E7%9A%84%E6%9B%B4%E5%A5%BD%E5%90%97-9dc0319ca2f9

articles.description:
吴说获悉，Polygon  宣布其 zkEVM 主网测试版已上线，以太坊联合创始人 Vitalik Buterin 进行了象征性的第一笔交易。Polygon  还表示，为了使网络具有抗审查性，用户最终将能够在发生故障时将交易强制到以太坊 L1，这一机制将在推出后短暂启用。
https://polygon.technology/blog/polygon-zkevm-mainnet-beta-is-live

articles.description: 根据欧盟成员国周一公布的欧盟数据法修订版，智能合约必须包含一个终止开关。要求智能合约能够中断或终止其活动的拟议立法引起了区块链社区的担忧，担心破坏本应是自动化和不可更改的程序。（CoinDesk）https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/03/27/eu-smart-contract-regulations-included-in-councils-data-act-draft/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=onecryptofeed&utm_campaign=headlines

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo;
- As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. 
- Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? 
If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. 
Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both… https://twitter.com/CryptoCapo_/status/1637374540933103617

il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update:
This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral.
Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520

Balaji: I will take that bet.
You buy 1 BTC.
I will send $1M USD.
This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k.
The term is 90 days.
All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Trump coming out pro crypto would put the industry in quite the conundrum lol

Chris Burniske: 7/ Crypto is going to be an issue for voters in 2024, and already that is a sign of us winning. But I have also never seen the US government be so draconian, and that *is* scary. In fact, so long as it's not Trump, it may cause me to vote Republican for the first time in my life
articles.title: Trump coming out pro crypto would put the industry in quite the conundrum lol

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
You can’t just spin up a vibrant ecosystem like @arbitrum’s. 
Many threadors seem to be implying that’s exactly what will happen with Zksync or whatever the next flavor-du-jour chain is.
@arbitrum is the exception not the rule IMO. https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1640060524351176706

CRG: Many ppl thought @arbitrum TVL would fall off a cliff after the airdrop
But it keeps on rising https://t.co/ZqTEePYSvs

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
I’d be curious for a comparison of #bitcoin and @ethereum fragility vs other asset classes. 
I’d speculate relative to single stocks of comparable size (say $tsmc) they probably compare favorably for resiliency to potential adversity (thousands of liquid markets all over the… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1640060488179494919

TradeButWhy: @DegenSpartan Do you ever consider the possible existence of a black swan tail event that demolishes or debunks crypto in the blink of an eye and makes most of your nw evaporate? That might be a use case for a small gold allocation in a portfolio
Or somehow messing up your storage and backups
